Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

Been playing for awhile now. Been really enjoying all the new and exciting plugins coming out! Anyways, I love the Spacecraft exchange forum, but I think people should be sharing their Space Station creations as well! I have a few in orbit around Kerbin, but they are lack luster! I would love if some people would share their Space Stations with everyone and hopefully give everyone some inspiration for IVA's coming in the near future!

Please post a screenshot and the .craft file if you would!

I make one.

BTW, you're from Canada too?

I am, I am.

Kerbin' it up in Ontario.

I make one.

BTW, you're from Canada too?

I don't see a Space Station on there. :/

You won't find many people that really like to share their stations. May I ask how YOU make YOUR stations? What station packs do you use? ExPI Space Stations is the one I use.

Edited August 25, 2012 by sneezedr424
